mapper.sql: effim.id as effim_id, effim.create_by, effim.create_time, effim.modified_by, effim.modified_time, effim.railways_bureau_id, effim.signal_depot_id,effim.special_railway_line_id, effim.station_id, start_date, end_date, meeting_theme, document_name,document_file, fault_data, t.tid as t_id,tlj_name, d.did as d_id,dwd_name, x.xid as x_id,xd_name, c.cid as c_id,cz_name

mro_equipment_field_fault_investigation_management effim inner join mro_tieluju t on effim.railways_bureau_id=t.tid inner join mro_dianwuduan d on effim.signal_depot_id=d.did inner join mro_xianduan x on effim.special_railway_line_id=x.xid inner join mro_chezhan c on effim.station_id=c.cid
